message.content:
cs.HC, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CV 

The paper focuses on investigating and designing freehand gestural interaction for interactive TV, which involves human-computer interaction (HCI) and multimedia (MM) aspects. The studies conducted in the paper also involve text input and menu selection, which are related to information retrieval (IR), natural language processing (NLP), and computer vision (CV). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction), followed by cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
